fields.name: Confirmation_Text
fields.fieldText: Great. We've started to set up your {!varCompanyName} demo. You'll receive notification when all of the steps of setting up have completed.

fields.name: Default_Activated_Text
fields.fieldText: Your default demo configuration {!Get_Default_Demo_Configuration.Name} has been activated. The org branding will be updated shortly.

fields.name: Demo_Type
fields.fieldText: What Demo Type are you looking to set up?

fields.name: Existing_Branding_Subtitle
fields.fieldText: Great news! This Demo Configuration already exists in your org. Here is what we're going to turn on for you.

fields.name: Set_Up_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
Welcome to DemoTiger Setup

Before you can start using DemoTiger, a few quick setup steps are required to make sure everything looks and functions the way it should. Please review the DemoTiger Setup steps.
